revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (3), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (3)

|brand = Netgear |model = ReadyNAS |submodelappend = yes |submodel = RND2000 |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = RND2000-200 |page_start_date = 02/24/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_ReadyNAS_Duo_RND2000 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6282;Armada 300, (Feroceon core); |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 <!-- TE --> |cpu1_type_rev = (ARMADA 300) |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.2 / 1.6 / 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SK hynix;H27U1G8F2BTR; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Atmel;AT25F512B; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ1G83DFR-H9C; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 2C:B0:5D,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.27; |stockos = Linux;2.6.31.8;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sata_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = yes,, 10-pin header,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;NEC;μPD720200;;1;,,, SMBUS Advanced Power Controller;Nuvoton;NCT3012S;;1;,,, 30V, 8.8A P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS4435BZ;;1;,,, 30V, 7A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS8984;;1;,,, 5V/12V Synchronous Buck PWM DC/DC Controller;Richtek;RT8105;;1;,,, 4.5V/18V Synchronous Step-Down Buck Switcher;TI;TPS65251;;1;,,, Field Programmable DSP Switcher;Marvell;G47B;;1;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.168.168 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2022 |fccapprovdate = 11/06/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0063E3ZPO |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Rear 2 USB Ports are from the USB 3.0 Host Controller :whose configuration is provided by the 2nd Flash.
*[http://netgear.nas-central.org/wiki/Category:ReadyNasDUO-200 ''Netgear ReadyNAS Duo v2 (RND2xxx-200)'' on '''NAS-Central''' wiki] :*CPU: [[Marvell]] 88FR131 (Feroceon) @1.6GHz (Nov 2011) :*CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (ARMADA 300) @1.6GHz
